title: Anand Rathi Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 279.43 crore, up 22.39% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Anand Rathi Wealth are:Net Sales at Rs 279.43 crore in December 2025 up 22.39% from Rs. 228.30 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 99.81 crore in December 2025 up 31.85% from Rs. 75.70 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 145.34 crore in December 2025 up 31.17% from Rs. 110.80 crore in December 2024. Anand Rathi EPS has decreased to Rs. 12.02 in December 2025 from Rs. 18.19 in December 2024. Anand Rathi shares closed at 3,131.70 on January 09, 2026 (NSE)
